meanings.sent1: The ranchera tended to the animals on the farm.
meanings.sent2: The ranchera owned a large piece of land where she raised cattle.
meanings.sent3: The ranchera joked that her cows were better listeners than most people.
meanings.sent4: With her hat and boots, the ranchera was the queen of the ranch.
meanings.sent5: The ranchera's love for the outdoors was evident in her daily work.

meanings.definition: A style of Mexican music, typically featuring a mariachi band
meanings.sent1: The ranchera music filled the streets during the festival.
meanings.sent2: People danced joyfully to the lively ranchera tunes.
meanings.sent3: The ranchera song made everyone want to get up and move.
meanings.sent4: The ranchera melodies painted a colorful picture of Mexican culture.
meanings.sent5: Listening to ranchera always brought a smile to her face.

meanings.definition: A Mexican dish consisting of grilled meat, beans, and tortillas
meanings.sent1: The ranchera was a delicious meal enjoyed by many families.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the sizzling ranchera filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: She savored every bite of the flavorful ranchera.
meanings.sent4: The juicy ranchera meat melted in her mouth like butter.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the ranchera on the grill was music to her ears.
